title: BBC condemns Russia's decision to not renew correspondent's visa
content:
1. BBC condemns Russia's decision to not renew correspondent's visa  BBC News
  2. Russia tells veteran BBC correspondent to leave as relations with West deteriorate  The Washington Post
  3. BBC Reporter Will Be Forced to Leave Russia After Moscow Refuses to Renew Visa  The Daily Beast
  4. Russia Says It Will Expel a BBC Journalist  The New York Times
  5. BBC Condemns 'Assault On Media Freedom' After Russia Expels Moscow Correspondent  Radio Free Europe / Radio Liberty
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:
